ruleResults.name: Ensure each container image has a pinned (tag) version
ruleResults.messageOnFailure: Incorrect value for key `image` - specify an image version to avoid unpleasant "version surprises" in the future

ruleResults.name: Prevent containers from accessing host files by using high UIDs
ruleResults.messageOnFailure: Incorrect value for key `runAsUser` - value should be above 9999 to reduce the likelihood that the UID is already taken

ruleResults.name: Ensure each container has a read-only root filesystem
ruleResults.messageOnFailure: Incorrect value for key `readOnlyRootFilesystem` - set to 'true' to protect filesystem from potential attacks

ruleResults.name: Prevent containers from escalating privileges
ruleResults.messageOnFailure: Missing key `allowPrivilegeEscalation` - set to false to prevent attackers from exploiting escalated container privileges

ruleResults.name: Ensure Deployment has more than one replica configured
ruleResults.messageOnFailure: Incorrect value for key `replicas` - running 2 or more replicas will increase the availability of the service
